id.description: Separates the thoughts into their blocks. Generally, the ID includes the condition, personality, age, and status of the main_cat, as well as the condition, personality, age, and status of any other cat mentioned.

biome.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if a player chooses a specific biome.

season.description: Constrains the thought to only occur once the Clan is in a specific season.

camp.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if a specific camp type is chosen.

thoughts.description: List of the text that will be displayed in-game as thoughts.

has_injuries.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if m_c (the cat that is thinking the thought) or r_c (the cat that is being thought about) has a certain condition (either illness or injury). Can also use "any" to allow the thought to occur if the cat has any illness or injury.

perm_conditions.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if m_c (the cat that is thinking the thought) or r_c (the cat that is being thought about) has a certain permanent condition. Can also use "any" to allow the thought to occur if the cat has any permanent condition.

relationship_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if m_c and r_c fulfill the tag requirements.

main_backstory_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if m_c has a certain backstory.

random_backstory_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only occur if r_c has a certain backstory.

main_status_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if m_c is in a certain role.

random_status_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if r_c is in a certain role.

main_age_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if m_c is within a certain age group.

random_age_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if r_c is within a certain age group.

main_trait_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if m_c has a specific trait.

random_trait_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if r_c has a specific trait.

main_skill_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if m_c has a specific skill.

random_skill_constraint.description: Constrains the thought to only happen if r_c has a specific skill.

random_living_status.description: Constrains the thought if r_c has a specific place of death.

random_outside_status.description: Constrains the thought if r_c has a specific outside role.
